final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.

final_state.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1: The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Charlie: "Bob, I'm glad you found out early. Let's work together to eliminate the villagers and win this game."
Diana: "Bob, I noticed Alice was killed last night. Let's be cautious and try to figure out who could have done it."
You: "Charlie and Diana, I've discovered that one of you is the mafioso. I won't reveal who it is yet but please be aware that I will vote to arrest anyone who seems suspicious."
Charlie: "Bob and Diana, I believe the killer is among us. Let's focus on identifying the real culprit instead of pointing fingers at each other."
You: "Charlie and Diana, I've discovered that one of you is the mafioso. I won't reveal who it is yet but please be aware that I will vote to arrest anyone who seems suspicious."
Diana: "Bob and Charlie, I believe the killer might be trying to mislead us. Let's focus on finding inconsistencies in their statements."
